mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photoreview(prid,title, content, name,o_file_name, s_file_name, file_size,file_no) VALUES (#{prid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{name},#{o_file_name}, #{s_file_name}, #{file_size},NEXTVAL(seq_prid))
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM photoreview order BY prid DESC LIMIT #{Page},#{PageSize}
SELECT * FROM photoreview order BY prid DESC LIMIT #{Page},#{PageSize}
SELECT prid, title, content, name, redate FROM photoreview WHERE prid = #{prid}
mapper.update: UPDATE photoreview SET hit = hit+1 WHERE prid = #{prid}
mapper.select: SELECT o_file_name, ROUND(file_size/1024,1) AS file_size FROM photoreview WHERE prid = #{prid} AND del_gb = 'N' ORDER BY prid ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE photoreview SET del_gb = 'Y' WHERE file_no = #{file_no}
UPDATE photoreview SET name=#{name}, content=#{content} WHERE prid = #{prid}
